ygData.subject: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: In the book On Languages it states on the first page that in the ancient times there was
ygData.messageBody:
<!doctype html public "-//w3c//dtd html 4.0 transitional//en">
<html>
In the book On Languages it states on the first page that in the ancient
times there was a split and a war between magic users, what was to become
the erudites with their wizardry and what was to become the Dark Elves
with there Necromancy.  It is said that to read the text of these
ancient spell casters you must learn Old Erudian for the forefathers of
Erudians and Elder Tier Dal for the forefathers of todays Dark Elves. 
I know that Tier Dal shows up as Dark Elvish when changing languages, I
also learned in my travels that Elder Tier Dal shows up a Lizardman. 
Using my higher inteligence I have concluded that Necromancers would probably
find it very usefull to learn Elder Tier Dal as I would find it usefull
to learn Old Erudian.  Now if anyone knows how I can learn Elder Dragon,
the harsh complex language of magic itself please let me know.  I
would very interested in learning that language or Combine for that matter.
<p>May our paths cross
<p>Zakrul The Traveler
<br><a href="http://members.xoom.com/Companions__/Companions.html">Companion</a>
<br>Wizard
<br>Britstlebane Server</html>
